title: Chemistry Essentials
description: Key concepts in the study of matter and reactions

concepts.definition: The basic unit of a chemical element

variations.text: Atoms consist of protons, neutrons, and electrons

concepts.definition: A group of atoms bonded together

variations.text: Water is a molecule made of hydrogen and oxygen

concepts.definition: Process in which substances convert into new substances

variations.text: Rust forming on iron is a chemical reaction
